text: The Gepiu is a river in Bihor County, Romania. Near Inand it discharges into the Corhana.Planul de management al riscului la inundații - Administrația Bazinală de Apă Crișuri, p. 16 Various reaches of the river are known under different names such as Pruniște River, Valea Cireșului River, Calaboj River, Sămăroaga River or Rădăoli River. Its length is . ==References== * Trasee turistice - județul Bihor Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Bihor County
title: Gepiu (river)
